channel.title: MoparScape Server Competition! *CANCELLED*
channel.description:
[b][size=30pt]CANCELLED BECAUSE OF LACK OF COMPETITORS AND LOTS OF IDIOTS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!![/size][/b] ______________________________________________________________________________________________________ No, this isn't official. Just a little competition hosted by me, pk3r john. _________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ [size=15pt][i][b]EDIT: TIME HAS BEEN EXTENDED BY 5 DAYS!! SO NOW THE DEADLINE IS NOVEMBER 1st, 11:59 PM EASTERN USA TIME!!![/b][/i][/size] How this works is, you submit a server onto this thread (just post) and the judges will rate it 1-10. I will then add up the scores for every server and find the average score of each server. The server with the highest score will win the competition. Please note there is no reward, it's just a little thing for you to have fun. Rules: 1. All servers must be submitted onto this thread by the next five days. (so the deadline is october 27th. EDIT: Now extended to Nov. 1.) 2. If you act like this is your life, or a war, you'll get disqualified automatically for being an idiot. 3. You cannot use an already finished server. You have to CREATE it and submit it by 11:59 PM, November 1st Eastern USA time. 3(CONT.) You may submit it BEFORE the deadline, it's recommended you do so you don't have to rush to submit. 4. NO TEAMS! SOLO PROJECT ONLY! If you are found using a group of people you will be automatically disqualified. 5. All MPSC rules apply. Some tips: You may use any base, but the recommended ones are; Shard Revolutions, Emulous, Final Devolution, or any cleaned out base. I advise you not to use Deltascape, but you may. Just don't be alarmed if a judge gives you a low rating because of this. It shouldn't be a really big factor though, so feel free to use a delta base. Also remember, quality > quantity will win you this comp. Also try to include skilling WITH pking. Competitors: 1. The Reaper X 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 7. 8. 9. 10. If you want to be a competitor, just post saying you want to be a competitor and I'll add your name to the list. Judges: 1. ChaosPkers 2. 'Aaron 3. Scape-JAVA [b]NO MORE JUDGE APPLICATIONS![/b] Please understand that if you're a judge you cannot submit a server! When submitting a server try to use a format like this:
[b]Server Title:[/b] [b]Base Used:[/b] (DESCRIPTION OF SERVER, LIST FEATURES, PROS, ETC...) (PICTURES HERE! NO PICTURES WILL GET YOU A LOW SCORE!) (CLOSING! JUST OFFER ADDITIONAL INFORMATION, OR WHATEVER YOU WANT!)
Of course you don't have to use it but you can if you want. Please don't flame me for making this... otherwise you're a dick. REMEMBER!! IT'S JUST FOR FUN SO THERES REALLY NO NEED FOR FLAME... OTHERWISE ^^ :)

We did what we were told to and asked questions, you could have been more detailed in your post…[/quote]

Not you, I meant some other people.

Read full topic
